Graeme Souness knows a thing or two about what it takes to win a trophy at Liverpool.
The Anfield great claimed 12 honours during six-and-a-half years as a player with the Reds and was skipper of th… [+3537 chars]

articles.description: Alan Shearer has urged the Premier League to finally approve Newcastle United’s reportedly imminent takeover during BBC One’s coverage of the FA Cup quarter-final between the Toon and Manchester City. The takeover has now been rumbling on for two months since…
